attributes.action: That Jayne Torville is made a Dame & Christpoher Dean is given a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although this famous couple known world wide for the successes in ice skating and that they have received an OBE in 1999.We think that in the next round of honours to be handed out, there are none more worthy than these two. They are a couple still loved by the British public. Kelly Holmes was made a Dame for her services to athletics, well deserved, so it's about time the queen recognised this couple again with the reward they both deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
